entry.title: Kaslyn - Twin/Twin Bunk Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Bunk Bed Frame
Price: 649.99

The beauty of cottage design shines with the bright white durable finish along with the stylish “X” motif and half rounded pilasters adorning the bed and case pieces making the “Kaslyn” bedroom collection the perfect way to create a cottage getaway within your own home.

Made with MDF and poplar solids. Clear sealed drawer boxes with ball bearing side guides and dovetail construction. Half round pilasters set on stylish turned bun feet. Cottage styling is earmarked by the use of overlay "X" motifs. Stylish single drawer night stand with open "X" back design. Bright white finish features a durable UV base coat for long lasting beauty. 

Kaslyn - White - Twin/Twin Bunk Bed Panels
99.2 lbs 
Kaslyn - White - Twin Bunk Bed Rails and Ladder
77.2 lbs

entry.title: Dinsmore - Twin/Twin Bunk Bed w/Ladder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Bunk Bed Frame
Price: 649.99

Step up to a higher level of style in kids bedroom furniture with this twin bunk bed. A cool response to the trend in modern industrial design, this metal bunk bed sports a black and gray for a welcome touch of maturity.

Product Features
  • Includes twin/twin bunk bed with ladder
  • Made of tubular metal with durable powdercoat finish
  • Sturdy ladder leads to top bunk
  • The Consumer Product Safety Commission states top bunks not be used for children under 6 years of age
  • Built-in slats eliminate need for foundations/box springs
  • Mattresses available, sold separately
  • Assembly required


About Dinsmore
Capturing the fun and excitement of youth, the "Dinsmore" bunk bed collection takes a bold contemporary design and combines it with a durable construction to create a flawless example of what youth bedroom furniture should be. The bold angles of this artistically designed contemporary furniture is constructed with strong tubular metal beautifully protected in a durable powdercoat finish of rich metallic tones that fit perfectly into any child's bedroom decor. Create a bedroom environment that your child will love with the exciting look of the "Dinsmore" bunk bed collection.

 

42"D x 78.5"L x 61.63"H

entry.title: Dinsmore - Twin/Full Bunk Bed w/Ladder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Bunk Bed Frame
Price: 649.99

Sleep safe and sound—in style. You’ll rest easy thanks to the top bunk’s guardrails, and they’ll love the "cool factor" of the industrial/contemporary design. This bunk bed is a victory for the whole family.

Product Features
  • Made of tubular metal
  • Durable powdercoat finish
  • Use with mattresses only; box springs not needed
  • Twin-size top bunk; full-size bottom bunk
  • Includes 2 guardrails for the top bunk and metal ladder
  • The Consumer Product Safety Commission states top bunks not be used for children under 6 years of age
  • Assembly required


About Dinsmore
Capturing the fun and excitement of youth, the "Dinsmore" bunk bed collection takes a bold contemporary design and combines it with a durable construction to create a flawless example of what youth bedroom furniture should be. The bold angles of this artistically designed contemporary furniture is constructed with strong tubular metal beautifully protected in a durable powdercoat finish of rich metallic tones that fit perfectly into any child's bedroom decor. Create a bedroom environment that your child will love with the exciting look of the "Dinsmore" bunk bed collection.

 

56"D x 78.5"L x 59.63"H
